title: accordion
description: A customizable accordion that comes in different variants.

propsTable.title: Accordion Props
propsTable.description: List of all properties supported by the accordion component.

rows.description: Aria label for accessibility. Provides additional context for screen readers.
Defines whether multiple items can be toggled at the same time.
Defines the visual variant of the accordion. Options are: 'light', 'bordered', 'shadow', 'splitted'.
Inline styles to be applied to the search bar.
Additional CSS class names to apply.

propsTable2.title: Accordion Item Props
propsTable2.description: List of all properties supported by the accordion item component.

rows.description: Aria label for accessibility. Provides additional context for screen readers.
Defines the headline for the accordion item.
Defines the subtitle for the accordion item.
The content for the accordion item.
Defines the icon that is visible when item is open. Works with react icons.
Defines the icon that is visible when item is closed. Works with react icons.

eventsTable.title: Events
eventsTable.description: List of all events emitted by the Search bar component.

rows.type: Accordion item event. Defines action in toggle.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Accessibility considerations for the Search bar component.

ariaRoles.description: The Accordion component is rendered with the search accordion by default.
The Accordion Item component is rendered with the accordion item accordion by default.
